task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: This section demonstrates how to use the multiplication feature of The Smart Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully multiply numbers, you need to know what multiplication is.

result.p: The result of the multiplication is displayed.

example.p: If you want to multiply 3 by 2, the equation will look like: 2×3=6. You enter 2, select cross, enter 3, and then select equal. The result 6 appears on the screen.
